about_the_game:
Follow the journey of our mischievous yet lovable Pirate, after he crash lands on a mysterious and remote island. Help him plunder his way across many interesting environments, in search of elusive treasures! Along the way, he'll encounter ambitious monkeys, hungry natives, naive villagers, restless spirits, giant creatures, voodoo rituals, ancient ruins, lava flows, and one overly playful bear.

Contend with many different obstacles, critters, and characters... all in his obsessive hunt to collect everything shiny!

Simply slide tiles around to form a path for the Pirate to follow. Explore your surroundings carefully! Many of the puzzles require a bit of exploration in order to discover what's possible, and where there might be hidden treasure. Once you know the solution, master each puzzle by going for the bonus star - the minimal number of moves necessary in order to grab the treasure and make it to the exit. Only true completionists will get them all!

List of features:

  • Solve 90 lovingly hand-crafted puzzles!

  • Explore 9 unique and mysterious environments

  • Follow the Pirate's story with 10 humorous cutscenes

  • Contend with 40 fully animated characters, creatures, and critters

  • Discover and collect 81 shiny treasures

  • Collect all 252 stars - for those true completionists out there!
